public class SelectStatsTabWidget extends io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.client.gui.widget.TSelectWidget<SelectStatsTabWidget.StatsTabEntry>
A TSelectWidget for StatsTabs.
Allows the user to Select a StatsTab via a GUI interface.

  • Method Details

    • entryOf

      public final SelectStatsTabWidget.StatsTabEntry entryOf(StatsTab statsTab)
      Returns a SelectStatsTabWidget.StatsTabEntry that is associated with a given StatsTab value. Will return null if no such SelectStatsTabWidget.StatsTabEntry exists or was removed.

    • setSelected

      public final void setSelected(StatsTab statsTab) throws NoSuchElementException
      Sets the selected SelectStatsTabWidget.StatsTabEntry using its StatsTab value.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If this SelectStatsTabWidget does not have a SelectStatsTabWidget.StatsTabEntry that corresponds with the given StatsTab value.
      See Also:
      • entryOf(StatsTab)
      • SelectStatsTabWidget.StatsTabEntry.getStatsTab()
